text: i could reproduce an issue with behave/#680/1.3 (like it keeps failing on CI)
the state transfer successfully updates the blockchain (length changes correctly)
but later when the chaincode is launched, it seems to reply with the old state?
i just can't get it to fail locally
how do i get my PRs merged?
<@U0ULK2JPP>, <@U0XPR4NP4>: how do we tie in chaincode deploy and state transfer?  Do we have to?  Will chaincode be deployed (and killed?) automatically, based on updated world state?

<@U0XR6J961>: <@U0ULK2JPP> I thought the conclusion had been that chaincode needs to live in the state, not in the block, so that so long as our state is correct, we don't need the blockchain to redeploy chaincodes
behave is no longer in bddtests on master?
